importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date when Netflix officially announced the new 'Kennedy' series, marking the release of news about the upcoming drama.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series spans from the 1930s to 1956, beginning with Joe and Rose Kennedy’s rise and covering the formative years of the Kennedy family before JFK’s presidency.

keyTakeAways: A new Netflix drama series titled 'Kennedy' is set to launch, focusing on the Kennedy family's rise and struggles.
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the personal triumphs and tragedies of the family.
The show is based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956'.
It begins in the 1930s and traces the journey of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The showrunner Sam Shaw describes the Kennedy story as 'the closest we have to American mythology,' blending historical depth with modern relevance.
The series is not related to the upcoming Ryan Murphy-produced 'American Love Story' focused on JFK Jr.
The series will consist of eight episodes and has not yet been released with a specific release date.

namedEntities.name: Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A political dynasty and central theme of the series
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The Kennedy family is the subject of the series, with the show dramatizing their rise and tragedies.

namedEntities.name: Michael Fassbender
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Actor starring in the series as Joe Kennedy, Sr.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is the lead actor portraying the patriarch of the Kennedy family, bringing a major Hollywood star to a historical drama.

namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Author of the biography on which the series is based
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His book 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956' serves as the source material for the series.

namedEntities.name: Joe Kennedy, Sr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The patriarch of the Kennedy family and central character in the series
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is portrayed by Michael Fassbender and represents the foundational figure of the Kennedy dynasty.

namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Joe Kennedy’s wife and mother of the Kennedy children
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: She is part of the family narrative, contributing to the portrayal of the Kennedy family’s domestic and political environment.

namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: 35th U.S. president and central figure in American political history
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is a key member of the Kennedy family and symbolizes the political legacy that the series explores.

namedEntities.name: JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: Son of John F. Kennedy and a presidential hopeful
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His tragic death in a plane crash in 1999 reinforces the 'Kennedy curse' narrative, which the show may allude to.

namedEntities.name: Sam Shaw
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He provided commentary on the significance of the Kennedy story as American mythology and historical insight.

namedEntities.name: Netflix
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: It is the producer and distributor of the new series, signaling its place in contemporary media culture.

namedEntities.name: Ryan Murphy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: TV producer of an upcoming unrelated series on JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His upcoming show is contrasted with the new Netflix series to clarify that the two are distinct.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917-1956.' The series, set to begin in the 1930s, stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the rise, struggles, and tragedies of the Kennedy family, including the legacy and pressures faced by Jack Kennedy. The show is described as a blend of American mythology and historical nuance, offering insight into both the family’s history and broader cultural developments. It is distinct from a separately planned Ryan Murphy series about JFK Jr. and will consist of eight episodes, with no release date yet confirmed.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
